titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the segment tax on domestic air transportation shall not apply to segments to or from certain islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/25/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt flight segments of 30 miles or less beginning or ending on certain small islands from the segment tax on domestic air transportation.
